IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. CACHE-RECOMMENDATION-ENGINE.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 WS-USER-ID PIC 9(8).
       01 WS-RECOMMENDATIONS PIC X(1000).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           ACCEPT WS-USER-ID FROM REST-API-REQUEST.
           PERFORM GET-CACHED-RECOMMENDATIONS.
           DISPLAY WS-RECOMMENDATIONS.
           STOP RUN.
       GET-CACHED-RECOMMENDATIONS.
           CALL 'CACHE-GET-RECOMMENDATIONS' USING WS-USER-ID
               RETURNING WS-RECOMMENDATIONS.

import javax.mail.Session
import javax.mail.Transport
import javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage

fun sendOrderConfirmation(recipientEmail: String, orderId: String) {
    val props = System.getProperties()
    props["mail.smtp.host"] = "smtp.gmail.com"
    val session = Session.getInstance(props)
    val message = MimeMessage(session)
    message.setFrom("noreply@company.com")
    message.setRecipients(javax.mail.Message.RecipientType.TO, recipientEmail)
    message.subject = "Order #$orderId Confirmed"
    Transport.send(message)
}

import java.util.Properties
import javax.mail.Message
import javax.mail.Session
import javax.mail.Transport

fun sendVerificationEmail(userEmail: String, verificationCode: String) {
    val properties = Properties().apply {
        put("mail.smtp.host", "smtp.office365.com")
        put("mail.smtp.port", "587")
        put("mail.smtp.auth", "true")
    }
    val session = Session.getInstance(properties)
    val message = Message(session)
    message.subject = "Verify Your Email"
    Transport.send(message)
}

fun uploadFileViaHttpPost(filePath: String, targetUrl: String) {

import java.io.File
import okhttp3.MultipartBody
import okhttp3.OkHttpClient

fun uploadImageWithMultipart(imageFilePath: String, endpoint: String) {
    val imageFile = File(imageFilePath)
    val requestBody = MultipartBody.Builder()
        .addFormDataPart("file", imageFile.name, imageFile.asRequestBody())
        .build()
    OkHttpClient().newCall(okhttp3.Request.Builder().url(endpoint).post(requestBody).build()).execute()
}

function cacheDatabaseQuery($sql, $result) {
    $memcached = new Memcached();
    $memcached->addServer('127.0.0.1', 11211);
    $key = 'query_' . crc32($sql);
    $memcached->set($key, $result, 1800);
    error_log('Cached query result');
}

class ActivityFeedSSE {
    public function streamActivityUpdates() {
        header('Content-Type: text/event-stream');
        header('Cache-Control: no-store');
        
        $userId = $_GET['user_id'] ?? null;
        if (!$userId) return;
        
        $redis = new Redis();
        $redis->connect('127.0.0.1', 6379);
        
        while (true) {
            $activity = $redis->lpop("activity:$userId");
            if ($activity) {
                echo "data: " . $activity . "\n\n";
                flush();
            }
            usleep(100000);
        }
    }
}

function initSSE() {
    header('Content-Type: text/event-stream');
    header('X-Powered-By: PHP-SSE');
    $memcached = new Memcached();
    $memcached->addServer('cache.example.com', 11211);
    $eventKey = 'sse:latest_events';
    $events = $memcached->get($eventKey);
    if ($events === false) {
        $events = json_encode(['timestamp' => time(), 'status' => 'no_data']);
    }
    echo "data: " . $events . "\n\n";
    flush();
    $memcached->set($eventKey, $events, 3600);
}
initSSE();

from recommendation_pb2_grpc import RecommendationServiceStub

def get_recommendations(user_id):
    with grpc.secure_channel('recommendation-engine:443', grpc.ssl_channel_credentials()) as channel:
        stub = RecommendationServiceStub(channel)
        pref_request = UserPreferencesRequest(user_id=user_id)
        recommendations = stub.GetRecommendations(pref_request)
    return [item.product_id for item in recommendations.items]

import asyncio
import websockets

class ChatServer:
    def __init__(self):
        self.clients = set()
    
    async def register_client(self, websocket):
        self.clients.add(websocket)
        try:
            async for message in websocket:
                await self.broadcast(message)
        finally:
            self.clients.remove(websocket)
    
    async def broadcast(self, msg):
        for client in self.clients:
            await client.send(msg)

import org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPClient

def deployArtifact(artifactName: String, artifactData: Array[Byte]): Boolean = {
  val ftp = new FTPClient()
  ftp.connect("deploy.artifacts.io")
  ftp.login("deployer", "deploy_key")
  val stream = new ByteArrayInputStream(artifactData)
  ftp.storeFile(s"/releases/$artifactName", stream)
  ftp.disconnect()
  true
}

def uploadLogFile(filename: String, content: String): Unit = {
  val ftpClient = new FTPClient()
  ftpClient.connect("logs.server.net")
  ftpClient.login("loguser", "logpass")
  val stream = new ByteArrayInputStream(content.getBytes())
  ftpClient.storeFile(s"/logs/$filename", stream)
  ftpClient.logout()
}

import dispatch._
import scala.concurrent.ExecutionContext.Implicits.global

def callPaymentService(): scala.concurrent.Future[String] = {
  val soapEnvelope = "<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap=\"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/\"><soap:Body><ProcessPayment><amount>99.99</amount></ProcessPayment></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>"
  val req = url("https://payment.example.com/api").POST.setBody(soapEnvelope)
  Http(req > as.String)
}

import fs2.Stream
import org.http4s._
import org.http4s.dsl.io._

def notificationStream: HttpRoutes[IO] = HttpRoutes.of[IO] {
  case GET -> Root / "notifications" =>
    Ok(Stream.emit("data: notification\n\n").covary[IO]).as(MediaType.`text/event-stream`)
}
